channel.title: Looking for hoster [24/7]
channel.description:
Hey, I am a co-owner of a Project Insanity Private Server and have been working on a this source with the owner and we have reached pretty far already.
We are maxing at 11 players hoping to go upto 20 by 2moro night and have an average of 4 players on at all times.
We have our website + webclient + voting + donations + etc setup and all we need is someone to host. Our previous hoster has to leave for military school and we will be left without someone to host. At the moment we can only afford a vps for one month and would be amazing if we could get a hoster to host for another 1-2 months so that we can build up our donations... So far with donations we have only been able to accumulate 60$.
Website: [url=http://paragonx.webege.com/]http://paragonx.webege.com/[/url] Home: [url=http://paragonx.webege.com/forum/]http://paragonx.webege.com/forum/[/url] Forums: [url=http://paragonx.webege.com/forum/index.php?/index]http://paragonx.webege.com/forum/index.php?/index[/url] Webclient: [url=http://paragonx.webege.com/forum/webclient.html]http://paragonx.webege.com/forum/webclient.html[/url]
So now as a reward for being our hoster, you will recieve many things..
Admin Rank on server and Mod rank on Forums.. Admin Rank on our server includes 80% of owner commands. As soon as we get a VPS your rank will not be taken from you unless it is necessary. Excess donations are split among'st Development Team (Coder + Founder + Hoster)
Our requirements for a Hoster are not that high: Computer Specs: RAM: 6GB+ Processor: 2.50Ghz +
Internet Specs: Preferably Wired Connection Bandwidth: Unlimited Upload Speed: 5 mb+ Download Speed: 30mb+ Ping: Between 2 and 25
Willing to pay 7$/mo if Overall Specs surpass the requirements by a lot. If you are ready to host, please comment your specs and your skype name with it.
Thanks, Shame.

item.title: Looking for hoster [24/7]
item.dc:creator: @HandgunSally HandgunSally
item.description:
@HandgunSally wrote:

im using a Poweredge T410 processor from dell, i can host you with ease… I am hosting a server on it atm and you can test its speed, id like to try to host both if its possible if not, I need the money…I am willing to host free until you start getting more donations… a few weeks… my msn is HandgunSally@yahoo.com

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for hoster [24/7]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“posen, post:7, topic:437378”]Computer Specs:
RAM: 8Gb
Processor: 3.2 Ghz Dual Core

Internet Specs:
Bandwidth: Unlimited
Upload Speed: 50 mb
Download Speed: 100 mb
Ping: Between 1 and 25

My Msn is Danny@realsmokers.dk[/quote]
The ping depends on the server its connecting to, and how the hell is it ‘1’?
I dont think 2 computers in my my house could get a ping of ‘1’…

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for hoster [24/7]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Shame012, post:3, topic:437378”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=540086.msg3954576#msg3954576 date=1332623569]
Uhrm not allowed.
Also, why do you need 250+ gb space for a server? o.O

[/quote]

What do you mean by “not allowed”
250gb of space is average on most computers nowadays plus its less likely for a computer to slow down itself if physical memory is good enough.[/quote]He means read the fucking rules

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for hoster [24/7]
item.dc:creator: @Shame012 Shame012
item.description:
@Shame012 wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:4, topic:437378”][quote author=Shame012 link=topic=540086.msg3954577#msg3954577 date=1332623777]

Uhrm not allowed.
Also, why do you need 250+ gb space for a server? o.O

What do you mean by “not allowed”
250gb of space is average on most computers nowadays plus its less likely for a computer to slow down itself if physical memory is good enough.
[/quote]
Wha…? i can run linux on 500mb of space with 6 gb, and it will still be faster than windows ever will. Physical space (most of the time) has nothing to do with speed.

Also, Requesting a hoster is not allowed in these forums.[/quote]

K sorry bout that… What category can i put this in?

Read full topic

Also, Requesting a hoster is not allowed in these forums.
